name: Sandwich Simulator June '22 (Year 1.1)
description:
Sandwich Simulator! June '22 (Year 1: Month 1)

This is a game I made for my friends, and I plan to make more! (2 - 8 players)

Control your bread character, gather ingredients, and then kill off your friends to finish off your sandwich with the last piece of bread! Be the first one to feed the customer!

Music wonderfully produced by Lightspeed6! They're on YouTube.

How to play:

Stack the required ingredients between two slices of bread. Get slices of bread by killing other players. Jump into the customer's mouth when the order is ready!

Controls (Keyboard/PS5/Switch):

  • WASD/Left stick: Move.
  • Spacebar/Cross/B button: Jump.
  • J/Square/Y button: Punch.
  • K/Circle/A button: Throw ingredient ("fireball").
  • L/Trigger buttons: Dodge left or right.
  • I/Triangle/X button: Pick up ingredients or player (use on opponents to kill them)(can beat punch and fireball).
  • Alt-F4: to exit out of the game (exit button added later).

I am developing another game for my friends to play, but I do intend to keep working on Sandwich Simulator! This is a prototype, but here are the intended features that will be added later on:

  • Exit Game button.
  • Make some of the ingredients more distinguishable.
  • How-to-play screen.
  • Controls screen.
  • Ready-up screen.
  • Make keyboard optional (as of now, it is required).
  • Round settings (instead of infinite rounds).
  • Load screen transitions.
  • Game-finish screen.
  • Particles.
  • Level Background.
  • Credits screen.
  • Order check confirmation.

Known bugs (to be fixed later)(feel free to comment some down below):

  • Dodging or being attacked into a wall causes a wall glitch.
  • A certain sequence of events causes a some ingredients in the stack to appear invisible.
  • Sometimes the floating score text doesn't show the right amount of points gained.
